title: Server issues?

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: I joined a champ select and never made it passed the ban phase, the client popped up with an "attempting to reconnect" but I could still see people typing/picking behind it. I eventually clicked the "exit instead" button provided and now I cant log back into the game due to an "unexpected error".

replies.body: We were having a couple issues with the authentication servers around the time you posted this, but those issues shouldn't have caused any actual disconnections. If this is still happening, try running a quick trace to our NA servers at 104.160.131.1 using a tool like [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/). Post the result here so I can go over them with ya.
